item.title: Stick Suicide!
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Cow Mad Cow
item.description:
@Mad_Cow wrote:

ActivateClient;

You don’t need that.

Also try indenting code:

procedure thestory; begin if (kill= 'knive') then begin ClearDebug; end; end;

Etc…

-Mad Cow

Read full topic

item.title: Stick Suicide!
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

YAY stick suicide!!! set up the const

Here it is, (i will make more!)

Also Make the debug box big because the stick figure is big and the animations.

[code]program StickSuicide;
//put cross hair on debug box

const
kill=(‘knive’); //knive,cliff,rope

procedure thestory;
begin
if (kill=(‘knive’)) then
begin
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
writeln(’ ’);
writeln(’ / |hate |’);
writeln(’ /(0) (0)\ //| work|’);
writeln(’ | ______ | | |’);
writeln(’ // ||’);
writeln(’ / \ ');
writeln('/_’);
writeln(’|| | || |’);
writeln(’|| | _||| || |’);
writeln(’|| | | | | || |’);
writeln(’|| | | | | || |’);
writeln(’|| | () () || |’);
wait(2000)
Cleardebug;
writeln(’ |---------|’);
writeln(’ ______ | how wiil|’);
writeln(’ /(0)(0)\ | i kill? |’);
writeln(’ | _____ | |---------|’);
writeln(’ _/ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ \ ‘);
writeln(’/ / | |\ \ ‘);
writeln(’\ / | | / ‘);
writeln(’| | | | ‘);
writeln(’| || | ‘);
writeln(’| / |/ \ | ‘);
writeln(’|\ | | | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | | /|\ ‘);
writeln(’ | | | ‘);
writeln(’ ||| ‘);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(’ |---------|’);
writeln(’ ______ | a sweet |’);
writeln(’ /(0)(0)\ | idea!! |’);
writeln(’ |_/| |---------|’);
writeln(’ _/_ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ \ ‘);
writeln(’/ / | |\ \ ‘);
writeln(’\ / | | / ‘);
writeln(’| | | | ‘);
writeln(’| || | ‘);
writeln(’| / |/ \ | ‘);
writeln(’|\ | | | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | | /|\ ‘);
writeln(’ | | | ‘);
writeln(’ ||| ‘);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
Writeln(’ ‘);
Writeln(’ ‘);
Writeln(’ ‘);
Writeln(’ ‘);
Writeln(’ kill=knive . . . ‘);
Writeln(’ … . . . . . . . . . ‘);
Writeln(’ . . . . . . |||| ‘);
Writeln(’ |||||||||/\ ‘);
Writeln(’ |||||||||||||||||||||||||| ‘);
Writeln(’/--------------------------’);
Writeln(’|_____________________|’);
wait(2000)
writeln(‘the end! :D’)
terminatescript;
end;
end;

begin
if (kill=(‘cliff’)) then
begin
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;

writeln(’|| | | | | || |’);

Cleardebug;

writeln(’ |_/| |---------|’);
writeln(’ _/_ ‘);

writeln(’| / |/ \ | ‘);
writeln(’|\ | | | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | | /|\ ‘);
writeln(’ | | | ‘);
writeln(’ ||| ‘);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(’ .—/\ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ , / ‘);

writeln(’ / ‘);
writeln(’ / ‘);

writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ ‘);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ * / ‘);
writeln(’ / ‘);
writeln(’ / ‘);
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ ‘);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ 0 ‘);
writeln(’ |/ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ ‘);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(’ /—\ |/ ‘);
writeln(’ |**| kill=cliff / ‘);
writeln(’ / ___/ / ‘);
writeln(’ _/ |/ \ ‘);
writeln(’ \ _ ‘);
writeln(’ \ ');
wait(2000)
writeln(‘the end! :D’)
terminatescript;
end;
end;

procedure thestory3;
begin
if(kill=(‘rope’))then
begin
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
writeln(’ ’);
writeln(’ / |hate |’);
writeln(’ /(0) (0)\ //| work|’);
writeln(’ | ______ | | |’);
writeln(’ // ||’);
writeln(’ / \ ');
writeln('/_’);
writeln(’|| | || |’);
writeln(’|| | _||| || |’);
writeln(’|| | | | | || |’);
writeln(’|| | | | | || |’);
writeln(’|| | () () || |’);
wait(2000)
Cleardebug;
writeln(’ |---------|’);
writeln(’ ______ | how wiil|’);
writeln(’ /(0)(0)\ | i kill? |’);
writeln(’ | _____ | |---------|’);
writeln(’ _/ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ \ ‘);
writeln(’/ / | |\ \ ‘);
writeln(’\ / | | / ‘);

writeln(’|\ | | | | ‘);

cleardebug;
writeln(’ |---------|’);
writeln(’ ______ | a sweet |’);
writeln(’ /(0)(0)\ | idea!! |’);
writeln(’ |_/| |---------|’);
writeln(’ _/_ ‘);

writeln(’/ / | |\ \ ‘);
writeln(’\ / | | / ‘);

writeln(’|\ | | | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | | /|\ ‘);
writeln(’ | | | ‘);
writeln(’ ||| ‘);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(’ ____ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
writeln(’ | | ‘);
writeln(’ __________ _/ ‘);
writeln(’ | | | | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | |–| | ‘);
writeln(’ ||| | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | | _/ ‘);
writeln(’ ||| | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | ‘);
writeln(’ || ‘);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(’ ____ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ ‘);
writeln(’ | | ‘);
writeln(’ __________ _/ ‘);
writeln(’ | | | | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | |–| | ‘);
writeln(’ | / \ | | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | | | _/ ‘);
writeln(’ |\ /__| | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | ‘);
writeln(’ | | ‘);
writeln(’ || ‘);
wait(2000)
Cleardebug;
writeln(’ || ‘);
writeln(’ || ‘);
writeln(’ || ‘);
writeln(’ /X X\ ‘);
writeln(’ | O | ‘);
writeln(’ ***/ ‘);
writeln(’ \// ‘);
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ // ‘);
writeln(’ // \ ‘);
writeln(’ || ‘);
writeln(’ ||| ');
writeln(‘the end! :D’)
terminatescript;
end;
end;

begin
cleardebug;
if(kill=(‘rope’))then
thestory3;
if(kill=(‘cliff’))then
thestory2;
if(kill=(‘knive’))then
thestory;
end.
[/code]

i like the cliff.!
